text: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Allah ki khatir raasti (upright) par qayam rehne waley aur insaf ki gawahi dene waley bano, kisi giroh ki dushmani tumko itna mushtail (move) na karde ke insaf se phir jao. Adal (insaf) karo, yeh khuda tarsi se zyada munasibat rakhta hai, Allah se darr kar kaam karte raho, jo kuch tum karte ho Allah ussey puri tarah ba-khabar hai
